Some great #mtnews for your weekend:

With help from the American Rescue Plan, we're bringing $5.7M to the Treasure State for AmeriCorps Montana. Investing in public lands and education are two of the best ways to support our rural communities, and AmeriCorps excels at both.

It was co-ops that electrified rural America, and it's rural electric co-ops that continue to keep Montana's lights on to this day. That's why we're investing $2.2M in the Lower Yellowstone Rural Electric Association to make the repairs needed to keep powering eastern Montana.

Tomorrow is the first Saturday of Great Outdoors Month, which makes it #NationalTrailsDay!
